questions.question: What is a potential negative effect of excessive social media use on mental health?
Which social media platform has fostered communities for discussing mental health?
What is a benefit of using renewable energy sources?
Why is digital literacy important for social media use?

answers.c: To balance online and offline interactions

questions.question: What is a challenge faced by renewable energy sources?

answers.b: High energy costs and limited adoption
answers.c: Increased greenhouse gas emissions and finite resources

questions.question: How can social media be used mindfully to support mental health?

answers.a: By comparing lives to curated online content
answers.b: By accessing mental health resources and support groups
answers.c: By engaging in cyberbullying and online harassment
answers.d: By ignoring mental health awareness campaigns

questions.question: What is being developed to enhance energy reliability in renewable energy systems?

answers.b: Battery storage systems and smart grids
answers.c: Nuclear power plants and coal-fired generators
answers.d: Solar panels and wind turbines only

questions.question: What is the potential outcome of widespread adoption of renewable energy sources?

answers.a: Increased dependence on finite resources and greenhouse gas emissions
answers.b: A cleaner and more sustainable planet
answers.c: Improved energy efficiency but decreased energy reliability
answers.d: Higher energy costs and limited access to renewable energy

questions.question: How do individual usage patterns impact the effect of social media on mental health?

answers.a: Excessive use always leads to negative effects
answers.b: Moderate use always leads to positive effects
answers.c: Individual usage patterns and digital literacy determine the impact
answers.d: Social media use has no impact on mental health

questions.question: What is the role of governments and organizations in promoting renewable energy?

answers.b: Ignoring the challenges of climate change
answers.c: Investing heavily in clean energy infrastructure
answers.d: Decreasing funding for renewable energy research
